name: Rental Counseling
description: We offer One-on-One Rental Housing Counseling to help renters to know the responsibilities and rights for landlords and renters, and get a clear understanding of fair housing content. The housing counselors provide related referral resources to the clients based on their situation.
fullDescription: We offer One-on-One Rental Housing Counseling to help renters to know the responsibilities and rights for landlords and renters, and get a clear understanding of fair housing content. The housing counselors provide related referral resources to the clients based on their situation.
